ffs RubberTow! Quit upping new stuff until somebody is able to download a complete copy of any of your previous material. It will take months to get any of this stuff at your current seeding rate!

Thankyou so much for ripping and sharing the Andy Sidaris collection of great TNA vids. I've been looking for these videos in good quality for a long time. You provided more than I could imagine. Thankyou Thankyou Thankyou.
BTW YOU ROCK and I will seed for as long as possible to celebrate your great deed.
to jgabriel: I see that you are not bright enough to recognize satire when you read it - RUBrtTOE

NEED HELP WITH SIDARIS FILMS! 

Looking for Andy Sidaris' early films, STACEY and SEVEN (aka SEVANO'S SEVEN). The only place online to get them is Cinemageddon, but when I try to register there, they don't send me a confirmation email. If anyone out there has these movies, or is a Cinemageddon members and can get them, please upload them to Pirate Bay! I'll be eternally grateful, and I'll seed indefinitely!

Please help! Thanks!
that's a nice upload dude. Keep it up! For all those who want to see a trailer first: it's on youtube. Cheers.
